titles.title: A resolution commemorating the success of the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams in the past 23 Olympic Winter Games and 11 Paralympic Winter Games and supporting the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams in the 2018 Olympic Winter Games and Paralympic Winter Games.

A resolution commemorating the success of the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams in the past 23 Olympic Winter Games and 11 Paralympic Winter Games and supporting the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams in the 2018 Olympic Winter Games and Paralympic Winter Games.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Supports: (1) the athletes of the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams in competing at the 2018 Olympic Winter Games and Paralympic Winter Games in PyeongChang, South Korea; and (2) the goals and ideals of the Olympic Games and the Paralympic Games.
